document.full_text: japan is considering raising the severity level of its nuclear crisis to put it on a par with the chernobyl accident 25 years ago, the worst atomic power disaster in history, kyodo news agency reported on tuesday.
document.title: japan may re-grade crisis to same level as chernobyl
lines_and_colors: japan is considering raising the severity level of its nuclear crisis to put it on a par with the chernobyl accident 25 years ago, the worst atomic power disaster in history, kyodo news agency reported on tuesday.
